contact.title: Contact Us
contact.name: Name
contact.respondWithin: We normally respond within 2 business days
contact.sendError: An error occurred while sending the message.

hero.title: Connect. Collaborate. Grow.
hero.subtitle: Birat Bazaar
hero.description: Your digital hub for business connections. Connect wishes with offers, match job seekers with employers, discover B2B events — all in one place. Powered by Chamber of Industries Morang (CIM).

objectives.title: Platform Objectives
objectives.subtitle: A focused digital ecosystem designed to enable meaningful B2B connections and inclusive growth

enhanceNetworking.title: Enhance Networking Opportunities
enhanceNetworking.description: Create a structured digital space where entrepreneurs, industrialists, and investors can discover each other and build meaningful connections.

promoteCollaboration.title: Promote Collaboration
promoteCollaboration.description: Match business offers with corresponding needs to encourage partnerships, joint ventures, and impactful business deals.

supportLocal.title: Support Local Industries
supportLocal.description: Provide visibility to district-specific strengths and capabilities, helping local businesses expand their reach across and beyond Koshi Province.

showcaseInvestment.title: Showcase Investment Potential
showcaseInvestment.description: Highlight regional investment-ready opportunities to attract capital, technology, and expertise into high-potential sectors.

inclusiveGrowth.title: Inclusive Growth
inclusiveGrowth.description: Ensure startups, women-led enterprises, and small businesses have equal access to networking, visibility, and collaboration opportunities.

wishOfferDesc.title: Business Collaboration Platform
wishOfferDesc.subtitle: Connect, Collaborate, and Grow Together in the B2B Ecosystem
wishOfferDesc.wishDescription: Express your business needs and growth objectives through our structured wish system. Whether you're seeking:
wishOfferDesc.wishConclusion: Our intelligent matching system ensures your business requirements reach the right potential partners, accelerating your path to successful collaborations.
wishOfferDesc.offerDescription: Showcase your company's unique value propositions and capabilities to potential business partners. Highlight your:
wishOfferDesc.offerConclusion: Create detailed business offers that demonstrate your organization's strengths and attract quality partnerships aligned with your growth strategy.

about.title: Enterprise Solutions
about.subtitle: Transforming Business Partnerships Through Innovation

enterpriseSolutions.title: Enterprise Solutions Platform
enterpriseSolutions.description: We are a comprehensive B2B collaboration platform that facilitates strategic partnerships, technology integrations, and business growth opportunities. Our ecosystem enables companies to find, connect, and collaborate with qualified business partners efficiently.

streamlinedProcess.title: Streamlined Process
streamlinedProcess.description: Our platform employs advanced algorithms and structured workflows to streamline business collaborations. Companies can create detailed business profiles, post specific requirements or offerings, and utilize our smart matching system to identify optimal partnership opportunities.

partnershipDevelopment.title: Partnership Development
partnershipDevelopment.description: Once matched, businesses can leverage our secure communication channels, document sharing, and collaboration tools to develop partnerships. Our platform provides structured frameworks for partnership agreements, progress tracking, and relationship management.

about.visualText: One platform for all your B2B needs

features.title: One Platform, Endless Possibilities
features.subtitle: Everything you need to grow your business and career in Nepal's digital B2B ecosystem

businessWishes.title: Business Wishes
businessWishes.description: Express your needs — partnerships, technology, supply chain, or investments. Our matching connects you to the right partners.

businessOffers.title: Business Offers
businessOffers.description: Showcase your products, services, and expertise. Create detailed offers to attract quality partnerships.

jobMatching.title: Job Matching
jobMatching.description: Employers find talent, job seekers find opportunities. All in one integrated platform.

inclusiveGrowth.title: Inclusive Growth
inclusiveGrowth.description: Equal access for startups, women-led enterprises, and small businesses to networking and visibility.

smartMatching.title: Smart Matching
smartMatching.description: Intelligent algorithms match wishes with offers, accelerating your path to successful collaborations.

localToGlobal.title: Local to Global
localToGlobal.description: Start local in Koshi Province, expand across Nepal and beyond with increased visibility.

platformFeatures.title: What We Offer
platformFeatures.subtitle: Everything you need to grow your business in one place

wish.title: Wishes
wish.description: Post your business needs and find matching offers from partners.

offer.title: Offers
offer.description: Showcase your products and services to potential business partners.

jobs.title: Jobs & Careers
jobs.description: Connect job seekers with employers. Find talent or opportunities.

events.title: B2B Events
events.description: Discover networking events, trade fairs, and business conferences.

matches.title: Live Matches
matches.description: Watch wishes and offers get matched in real-time.

bds.title: Business Services
bds.description: Access business development services and support.

howItWorks.title: How Birat Bazaar Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Four simple steps to start connecting and growing your business

step1.title: Create Account
step1.description: Sign up and build your business profile with your capabilities and goals.

step2.title: Post Wish or Offer
step2.description: Express what you need (wish) or what you can provide (offer) to the marketplace.

step3.title: Get Matched
step3.description: Our system matches your wishes with relevant offers and vice versa.

step4.title: Connect & Grow
step4.description: Connect with matched businesses and build meaningful partnerships.

ctaSection.title: Ready to grow your business?
ctaSection.subtitle: Join Birat Bazaar and connect with businesses across Koshi Province.

footer.subscribeDescription: Sign up now to receive offers and information about us and never miss an update from B2B!
footer.subscribedDesc: You have subscribed to our newsletter.
footer.districtDescription: Explore business opportunities in specific districts and regions.
